text:
[Verse]
Moonlight on the highway
Stars that guide the way
Music loud we're flying
Night is here to stay

[Verse 2]
Windows down and singing
Voices in the wind
Feel the freedom calling
Let the night begin

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we're glowing
Every mile we're showing
Hearts ignite no slowing
Together we are growing

[Verse 3]
City lights behind us
Darkness all around
Road ahead is endless
Feet not on the ground

[Bridge]
Dreams are blending in now
Lost in every beat
Rhythm of our journey
Nothing feels as sweet

[Chorus]
Midnight drive we're glowing
Every mile we're showing
Hearts ignite no slowing
Together we are growing
title: Midnight Drive
